text: Augusto Martelli (15 March 1940 - 3 November 2014) was an Italian composer, conductor, arranger and television personality. He was known for composing the song Djamball√†. It was the theme song of the 1971 movie Il dio serpente. Martelli was born in Genoa, Italy. Martelli died in Milan, Italy, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:20th-century Italian composers Category:Italian conductors Category:Musicians from Genoa Category:Italian television personalities
title: Augusto Martelli
